ACo.doc: ID of the preference previously created

AEP.doc: It is a short description that the subscriber will see during the checkout process and in the notifications.

AEQ.doc: Indicates the frequency value. Together with frequency_type they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.

AES.doc:
Indicates the type of frequency. Together with frequency they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
days: Indicate a frequency in units of days
months: Indicate a frequency in units of months

AEU.doc: It is optional and is used to create a limited subscription. Indicates the number of times that we will repeat the recurrence cycle. If this param is not defined, subscription does not end until some of the parties cancel it.

AEW.doc: Day of the month that the subscription will always be charged. It only accepts values between 1 and 28. This setting is only available for subscriptions with a plan associated.

AEY.doc:
Charge a proportional amount to the billing day at the time of registration.
true: Charge a proportional amount based on the days remaining in the next billing cycle. Billing cycles are always calculated on a 30-day basis.
false: Charge the amount of the subscription regardless of when in the billing cycle customer subscribe.

AEa.doc: Indicates the frequency value. Together with free_trial_frequency_type they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.

AEd.doc:
Indicates the type of frequency. Together with free_trial_frequency they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
days: Indicate a frequency in units of days
months: Indicate a frequency in units of months

AEf.doc: Amount that will be charged on each invoice.

AEh.doc:
ID of the currency used in the payment.
ARS: Argentine peso.
BRL: Brazilian real.
CLP: Chilean peso.
MXN: Mexican peso.
COP: Colombian peso.
PEN: Peruvian sol.
UYU: Uruguayan peso.
